title: Provides that written notice of premium rate changes be given not less than sixty days prior to the effective date of such rate changes
summary: Provides written notice of premium rate changes not less than sixty days prior to the effective date of such rate changes.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1247

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. HAWLEY, McKEVITT, BURLING, RAIA, TOBACCO, FINCH
         -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of  A.  BARCLAY,  CALHOUN,  JORDAN,  MENG,
         MOLINARO, SAYWARD, WEISENBERG -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Election Law

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  insurance law, in relation to providing written
         notice of premium rate changes not less than sixty days prior  to  the
         effective date of such rate changes

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Paragraph 4 of subsection (p) of section 3221 of the insur-
    2  ance law, as added by chapter 661 of the laws of  1997,  is  amended  to
    3  read as follows:
    4    (4)  At the time of coverage renewal, an insurer may modify the health
    5  insurance coverage for a group or blanket policy offered to a  large  or
    6  small group policyholder so long as such modification is consistent with
    7  this  chapter  and  effective  on  a uniform basis among all small group
    8  policyholders with that policy  form;  PROVIDED,  HOWEVER,  THE  INSURER
    9  SHALL PROVIDE WRITTEN NOTICE TO ALL POLICY HOLDERS TO WHICH THE MODIFIED
   10  POLICY  SHALL  BE  OFFERED  OF ANY CHANGE IN PREMIUM RATES NOT LESS THAN
   11  SIXTY, BUT NOT MORE THAN ONE HUNDRED TWENTY, DAYS PRIOR TO THE EFFECTIVE
   12  DATE OF SUCH RATES.
   13    S 2. This act shall take effect September 1, 2011.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03374-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to providing written notice of premium rate changes not less than sixty days prior to the effective date of such rate changes
